thread.title: Steve & Jane Roberts
thread.title_full: Independent Carpet One Westland reviewed by Steve & Jane Roberts

author: Steve & Jane Roberts
title: Steve & Jane Roberts
text: They did all that could be done when the original carpet in one of the rooms didn't turn out right due to a manufacturing error. They had the manufacturer make a new carpet and it looks great.
